The Universe is vast, Yet meaningful synchronicities abound. We're here for one another.

item.title: Memes/tomfoolery
item.description:
If I ever get something like this, I'm going to use it til the wheels come off
Sometimes I like to crop reddit posts for one reason or another. I'm not sure why, but I'm sure it was warranted
The secret ingredient is crime.
I'd like to take a second and give you the straight dick. Things are getting hot and heavy, please go out and get a gun. Don't let these fuck-heads take you without a fight. I'm not condoning vigilante mayhem. I'm saying prepared to defend yourself. Stop putting it off. And for the love of god, follow your local gun laws. If you're not American, please know that I'm deeply ashamed of all of this. Please don't visit us. Go to Ireland, it's so much nicer.

item.title: Defence Of Houses
item.description: Illustrations from Defence Of Houses by Colonel Wade. During WWII, the British were preparing in case the Germans decided to invade. Various pamphlets and booklets such as this one were published for the Home Guard. I thought this would be useful for those who like to play paintball.

item.title: Yo Dawg, I heard you like Garlic Bread...
item.description: Not the exact recipe from above, but... To make Lasagna-stuffed Garlic Bread, hollow out a loaf of Italian bread, fill the cavity with layers of cooked lasagna noodles, meat sauce (ground beef, marinara), ricotta, and mozzarella cheese, brush the outside with garlic butter, then bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20-30 minutes until bubbly and golden. Garnish with Parmesan and fresh basil for a cheesy, garlicky twist on classic lasagna. Ingredients: 1 large loaf of Italian or French bread Lasagna noodles (cooked) Meat sauce (marinara + cooked ground beef/sausage) Ricotta cheese Shredded mozzarella cheese Grated Parmesan cheese Garlic butter (melted butter, minced garlic, Italian seasoning) Fresh parsley or basil, chopped (for garnish) Instructions: 1. Prep Bread & Oven: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Slice the bread in half lengthwise and scoop out some of the soft bread to create a boat. 2. Make Garlic Butter: Mix melted butter, minced garlic, and Italian seasoning in a small bowl. 3. Layer Filling: Spread a little marinara or cheese on the bottom of the bread boat, then layer with cooked noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella. Repeat layers until full. 4. Assemble: Top the last layer with more mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. 5. Add Garlic Butter: Brush the garlic butter mixture generously over the top and sides of the bread. 6. Bake: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly and the bread is toasted. For extra browning, you can broil for 1-2 minutes, watching carefully. 7. Garnish & Serve: Let it rest briefly, then garnish with fresh basil or parsley before slicing and serving.

item.description: Reference Cheat Sheet 1)​ Establish Custody Status Action: Ask, "Am I free to leave?" Reason: This forces the officer to admit if you are being detained. If they say "no," it helps prove you are in "custody," which is the legal trigger for Miranda rights to apply. 2) ​Verbally Invoke Silence ​Action: Say, "I am invoking my right to remain silent." ​Reason: Simply being quiet is not enough. Under current legal standards, you must verbally state your intent to remain silent to gain the legal protection of the Fifth Amendment. 3) Request Legal Counsel ​Action: Say, "I am invoking my right to an attorney." ​Reason: Be direct and clear. Avoid phrases like "I think I might need a lawyer." Use the exact phrase once, clearly, and do not offer any further explanation. 4) Stop All Communication (STFU) ​Action: Stop talking entirely. ​Reason: Officers may use "casual conversation" or "small talk" to get you to lower your guard. Anything you say during these informal moments can still be used against you, even after you have invoked your rights. Vote.org Look around. While they’ve turned us on each other—left against right, worker against worker—they’ve been looting the country's Treasury into the unforeseeable future. They want us distracted by culture/class wars while they steal our wages, our dignity, our future. But the spell’s broken. We see them now. And we are done. We live in the richest nation in history—but families work three jobs to keep the lights on, diabetics ration insulin, and teachers buy their own supplies. Billionaire's rocket for Joy ride to the stars while our neighbors sleep in cars. This is not okay. Here’s the line in the sand: Healthcare is a human right. Pensions are earned, not gifted. Fair wages are non‑negotiable. This is our country—not theirs. Democracy doesn’t defend itself. We do. Every strike, every vote, every act of solidarity shakes their foundation. So here’s what we do Register. Vote. Show up. They think we won’t fight. They think we’re beaten. They’re wrong. We’re awake. We’re united. We’re taking it back. Stand up. Lean in. Let’s go. —TODAY: Join a union. Back the fighters: ACLU, SEIU, Indivisible, NOW, Public Citizen, AFL‑CIO, NEA, MADRE, SPLC, AARP and every other group standing up for workers, women, the poor, young, infirm and the old. At some point in everyone's life they need a hand. Vote.org while you still can...

item.title: TheFreePizzaDude is back!
item.description:
Happy Friday from Minneapolis everyone! If you'd like to help a struggling Imgurian get groceries or a meal today there are 2 easy ways -
You can find a request for food in the comments, reply to them and then send a DM to get an order set up Or you can contribute to the Imgurian Meal Fund and we'll send the food for you!
Anonymous Angels have been so amazing helping us feed more people, we love you so much! https://www.paypal.me/TheFreePizzaDude https://ko-fi.com/thefreepizzadude
And here's how you'd send it yourself! Any questions as an Angel? Just shoot us a message! We'll be on this username until 8pm central
The Pucketts are here to show you how it works for requests -
It's much easier for us to help requests in the US but we'll do our best to pick up requests from any country. Putting your country in your comment helps us match you to an Angel in your area
Any questions as a requestor? Just leave a comment! We'll have helpers on the post for 6 hours
6 more hours to help as many people as we can Let's get it going! ... Today's Meal Tally 240 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th by @OP 300 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th and 10th by Pizza Angel @weasel 340 11th, 12th, 13th and 14th by @OP 400 15th and 16th by Pizza Angel @PepperoniAndFingernailPizza 425 17th by Pizza Angel @PepperoniAndFingernailPizza 450 18th, 19th, 20th and 21st by @OP 535 22nd, Michael Jordan, Kobe Bryant and 25th by Pizza Angel @NoRoutesFound 615 26th, 27th, 28th, 29th and 30th by @OP 645 31st, 32nd, 33rd and 34th by Pizza Angel @PepperoniAndFingernailPizza 800 35th by Pizza Angel @kInADress ... Today's Grocery Tally 300 1st by Grocery Angel @weasel 430 2nd by Grocery Angel @PepperoniAndFingernailPizza 600 3rd by Grocery Angel @PepperoniAndFingernailPizza
item.dc:creator: TheFreePizzaDude
